## DecodeOutput type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DecodeOutput<T> = {
    isSucc: true;
    value: T;
    errMsg?: undefined;
} | {
    isSucc: false;
    errMsg: string;
    errPhase: "decode" | "validate" | undefined;
    value?: undefined;
};
```
